mapper.insert: INSERT INTO baking.comment(content, user_id, content_id, create_time) VALUES (#{content},#{userId},#{contentId},#{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT cm.id, u.img_url userImgUrl, u.nickname, cm.content, cm.create_time FROM baking.comment cm JOIN baking.content c on c.id = cm.content_id JOIN baking.user u on u.id = cm.user_id WHERE content_id = #{contentId}
